details.title: Responsibilities
items: Updating the website of the Centre for Research in Mathematics and Data Science to introduce new features and comply with the university's branding.
Migrating the content from the old website to the new one.
Developing a simple and robust content management system.

details.title: Achievements
items: Developed and designed a web application on top of Nuxt (as static generator for Vue) and Vuetify (Material Design UI components for Vue).
Maintained a fully-customisable theming system to comply with the university's branding.
Created an automated flow for the deployment of the website by integrating the dedicated GitHub repository with Travis CI for hosting via GitHub Pages platform (JAMStack).
